creator: Technify Soft
descriptionHtml:
SIM Packages Pakistan provides information of all Packages of all Networks (including JazzWarid, Ufone, Zong, Telenor) of Pakistan in one app.
You can also add any package to you favorite list so you can use it later. You can also add your own package to use it later.
Features:
Call Packages
SMS Packages
Internet Packages
International Packages
Location Based Packages
Postpaid Packages
Broadband Packages

Note: We are not affiliated with any of these network companies. This app is intended for informational purpose only.
